title: Plum cobbler
ingredients: ['800 g (1¾ lb) plums, halved or quartered', 'grated zest and juice of 1 large orange', '1 cinnamon stick', '2 tbsp light muscovado sugar', 'Scone topping', '200 g (7 oz) self-raising flour', 'pinch of salt', '1 tsp baking powder', '30 g (1 oz) cool unsalted butter, diced', '30 g (1 oz) light muscovado sugar', '1 tbsp chopped walnuts', '100 ml (3½ fl oz) semi-skimmed milk, plus 1 tbsp milk for brushing']
